name: Power Word Stun
description: You overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range. If the target has 150 Hit Points or fewer, it has the Stunned condition. Otherwise, its Speed is 0 until the start of your next turn. The Stunned target makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.

conditionsApplied.duration: Until the target succeeds on a Constitution saving throw (requires 150 HP or fewer)

hpThresholdEffects.effect: The target has the Stunned condition. The Stunned target makes a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.
The target's Speed is 0 until the start of your next turn.
hpThresholdEffects.duration: until the start of your next turn
